627500.name: Sandra and Woo in the Cursed Adventure - Poser Pack Upgrade
627500.description:
The Poser Pack includes:

  • Sandra and Woo – the comic

    All Sandra and Woo strips created by Powree and Oliver Knörzer before the release of the game. That's over 860 strips for many hours of reading fun!.

  • Soundtrack

    20 diverse tracks, composed by Jan Haak, Klaus Müller, Dimitris Liatsos and Björn Zimmermann, as MP3s.*

  • Artwork

    A package of 33 Sandra and Woo artworks, created by Powree.

  • Making-Of

    A brief making-of of the game in 26 pictures. In addition an animation file (Larisa!) and one of the background scenes directly from the production.

  • Gaia - the comic

    As a special goodie, the expansion pack also contains over 120 fully colored pages from Gaia, a fantasy comic created by Powree and Oliver Knörzer.


* List of tracks included:
01 Klaus Müller - My Life is a Game
02 Björn Zimmermann - Synapsia 1
03 Klaus Müller - Fantasy Arcade
04 Dimitris Liatsos - Sandra's Room
05 Jan Haak - Sandra's Theme
06 Klaus Müller - Breaking Woo's
07 Björn Zimmermann - Synapsia 2
08 Jan Haak - The Castle
09 Klaus Müller - Siege of the Tone
10 Stefan Müller - Water Rocket
11 Dimitris Liatsos - Sandra's Street
12 Klaus Müller - Stop the Drop
13 Jan Haak - Main Menu
14 Klaus Müller - Hacking in
15 Björn Zimmermann - Synapsia 3
16 Klaus Müller - Hacking out
17 Björn Zimmermann - Synapsia 4
18 Klaus Müller - Spuknit and the Cave
19 Dimitris Liatsos - Sandra's Friends
20 Jan Haak - The Fields
(36:47)
627500.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
